I.name: Dirty Fighting
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Whenever '''Akshan''' uses a basic attack, he fires an additional shot after a delay that deals {{as|50% AD}} {{as|physical damage}}, increased to {{as|100% AD}} against {{tip|minions}}. If '''Akshan''' cancels the second shot, he gains {{as|{{pp|20 to 75}}|ms}} {{times}} {{as|(1 + 100% '''bonus''' attack speed)}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} decaying over 1 second.

The additional shot applies {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects at 100% effectiveness and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for{{ft|{{as|{{critical damage|{{#expr:0.5*0.7*175}}|{{#expr:0.5*70}}}} AD}} ({{tip|minion|icononly = true}} {{as|{{critical damage|{{#expr:0.7*175}}|70}} AD}})|70% '''total''' {{sti|{{as|critical damage}}}}}}{{as|physical damage}}.

'''Akshan's''' basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}} and ability hits apply a [[stack]] to affected enemies for 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times and refreshing on subsequent applications. The third stack consumes them all to deal {{as|{{pp|10 to 45 for 8;55 to 105 for 6;120 to 165 for|formula=10 + 5 per level until level 8, then 10 per level until level 14, then 15 per level}} '''bonus''' magic damage}} and, if the target is a {{tip|champion}}, '''Akshan''' is granted a {{pp|40 to 280}} {{as|(+ 35% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{tip|shield}} for 2 seconds. The shield may be gained only once every few seconds.
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Whenever Akshan uses a basic attack, he fires an additional shot after a delay that deals 50% AD physical damage, increased to 100% AD against minions. If Akshan cancels the second shot, he gains 20 − 75 (based on level) × (1 + 100% bonus attack speed) bonus movement speed decaying over 1 second.
The additional shot applies on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness and can critically strike forphysical damage.
Akshan's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits apply a stack to affected enemies for 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times and refreshing on subsequent applications. The third stack consumes them all to deal 10 − 45 for 8;55 (based on level) bonus magic damage and, if the target is a champion, Akshan is granted a 40 − 280 (based on level) (+ 35% bonus AD) shield for 2 seconds. The shield may be gained only once every few seconds.
I.notes:
* Applies {{tip|basic damage}} for the second shot and {{tip|proc damage}} for the bonus damage.
* The second shot:
** Is treated as a basic attack.
** Critically strikes independently from the first shot.
** Can be cancelled by inputting a different command right after using the first shot.
** Counts as a separate hit for effects such as {{ri|Electrocute}}, {{iis|Muramana}} {{nie|Shock}}, and {{iis|Eclipse}} {{nie|Ever Rising Moon}}.
* The attack speed scaling on the movement speed buff includes the bonus attack speed gained from '''Akshan's''' innate attack speed growth.
** At level 18, at minimum it grants {{fd|{{#expr: 75 * (1 + 17*{{ccd|Akshan|as_lvl}}*0.01)}}}} decaying movement speed.

Q.name: Avengerang
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Akshan''' throws a boomerang in the target direction that grants {{tip|sight}} around its trajectory and deals {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit, extending the boomerang range and {{tip|standard sight|revealing}} them for 1 second. If the boomerang hits an enemy {{tip|champion}}, '''Akshan''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} decaying over 1 second.

Once the boomerang has passed its original range and has not struck an enemy in the last 500 units of travelling, it homes back to '''Akshan''' and applies the same effects to enemies hit. Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
''Avengerang's'' damage is reduced against non-champions.
Q.descriptionHtml:
Active: Akshan throws a boomerang in the target direction that grants sight around its trajectory and deals physical damage to enemies hit, extending the boomerang range and revealing them for 1 second. If the boomerang hits an enemy champion, Akshan gains 40% bonus movement speed decaying over 1 second.
Once the boomerang has passed its original range and has not struck an enemy in the last 500 units of travelling, it homes back to Akshan and applies the same effects to enemies hit. Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
Avengerang's damage is reduced against non-champions.
Q.notes:
* ''Avengerang'' will fire from wherever '''Akshan''' is at the end of the cast time.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only block a single hit. They do not prevent the initial throw from extending its range.

effects.str: • Total Physical Damage: (+ % AD)

W.name: Going Rogue
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Akshan''' marks enemy {{tip|champions}} that kill allied champions as ''Scoundrels'' for 60 seconds. If '''Akshan''' scores a {{tip|takedown}} against a ''Scoundrel'' while alive and within 3 seconds of damaging them, he receives an additional {{g|100}} and revives all {{tip|death|dead}} allied champions that they have slain after 1 second.

When '''Akshan''' claims a ''Scoundrel's'' bounty he removes the marks of all other enemies. ''Scoundrels'' refresh their mark duration on subsequent kills, and will have their mark removed when they die by any means. '''Akshan''' cannot mark enemies as ''Scoundrels'' while they are dead. Allies are revived at their [[Spawn|summoning platform]].

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Akshan''' enters {{tip|camouflage}}, which lasts indefinitely while he is near [[terrain]] or inside {{tip|brush}}<!-- or {{tip|Chemtech Fog}}-->, and for 2 seconds otherwise. During ''Going Rogue'', '''Akshan''' can see trails leading toward ''Scoundrels'', and while moving towards them if they are within {{tt|5000|Pending for test}} units, he gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' mana regeneration}}}} equal to {{as|12% of his '''missing''' mana}} as well as {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.
''Going Rogue'' can be recast after 1 second, and does so automatically after its duration. Attacking or casting abilities ends ''Going Rogue'' immediately.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Akshan''' ends ''Going Rogue''.
W.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Akshan marks enemy champions that kill allied champions as Scoundrels for 60 seconds. If Akshan scores a takedown against a Scoundrel while alive and within 3 seconds of damaging them, he receives an additional 100 and revives all dead allied champions that they have slain after 1 second.
When Akshan claims a Scoundrel's bounty he removes the marks of all other enemies. Scoundrels refresh their mark duration on subsequent kills, and will have their mark removed when they die by any means. Akshan cannot mark enemies as Scoundrels while they are dead. Allies are revived at their Spawn.
Active: Akshan enters camouflage, which lasts indefinitely while he is near terrain or inside brush, and for 2 seconds otherwise. During Going Rogue, Akshan can see trails leading toward Scoundrels, and while moving towards them if they are within 5000 units, he gains bonus mana regeneration equal to 12% of his missing mana as well as bonus movement speed.
Going Rogue can be recast after 1 second, and does so automatically after its duration. Attacking or casting abilities ends Going Rogue immediately.
Recast: Akshan ends Going Rogue.
W.notes:
* '''Akshan''' can move during ''Going Rogue's'' cast time.
* The mark displays the duration and slay count.
** Enemy champions that kill '''Akshan''' will not be marked as ''Scoundrels'' nor increase their slay count.
* {{tip|Clone|Clones}} do not count for triggering ''Going Rogue's'' passive.
* ''Going Rogue's'' buff refreshes to last indefinitely upon moving near terrain or into brush, and will refresh to 2 seconds after leaving near terrain or brush.
* Allied champions within a {{tip|zombie state}} are revived only after the state ends.
* '''Akshan''' can still trigger ''Going Rogue's'' passive while he is within a {{tip|zombie state}}.

E.name: Heroic Swing
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Akshan''' can activate ''Heroic Swing'' three times before the ability goes on cooldown, and can use the third cast only after {{fd|0.5}} seconds of the second cast. '''Akshan''' may input a attack or movement command to use the second and third casts.

{{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Akshan''' prepares to swing for up to {{fd|2.125}} seconds, firing a hook in the target direction that embeds in the first [[terrain]] hit. ''Heroic Swing's'' second cast can be used while the hook is attached. If the hook fails to attach or '''Akshan''' is {{tt|moved|See notes}} or becomes {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}}, {{tip|ground|grounded}}, or {{tip|polymorph|polymorphed}} within the duration, the preparation will end prematurely, cancelling ''Heroic Swing'' in the process.

{{sbc|Second Cast:}} '''Akshan''' {{tip|dash|swings}} around the terrain in the target direction for 3 seconds, and stops upon colliding with an enemy champion or terrain. While swinging, he rapidly fires at the nearest {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy to deal them {{as|physical damage}} and apply {{tip|on-hit}} effects at 25% effectiveness per shot.
'''''Akshan''' will be {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} by any {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} or {{tip|polymorph|polymorphing}} crowd control during the dash.''
{{sbc|Third Cast:}} '''Akshan''' {{tip|dash|jumps}} to the target location, though not through terrain, and fires one last shot at a nearby {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy.

Scoring an enemy champion {{tip|takedown}} {{sti|cdr|reduces}} ''Heroic Swing's'' '''current''' cooldown to {{fd|0.5}} seconds. The shots can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for{{ft|{{critical damage|57.5|90}} '''bonus''' damage|90% {{sti|{{as|critical damage}}}}}}and {{tip|applies life steal|apply}} {{stil|life steal}} at 100% effectiveness. '''Akshan''' prioritizes firing at enemy champions with stacks of {{ai|Dirty Fighting|Akshan}}, will not fire while {{ai|Comeuppance|Akshan}} is active, and {{tip|sight|reveals}} himself while firing. ''Heroic Swing'' can be cast during '''Akshan's''' other abilities.
E.descriptionHtml:
Active: Akshan can activate Heroic Swing three times before the ability goes on cooldown, and can use the third cast only after 0.5 seconds of the second cast. Akshan may input a attack or movement command to use the second and third casts.
First Cast: Akshan prepares to swing for up to 2.125 seconds, firing a hook in the target direction that embeds in the first terrain hit. Heroic Swing's second cast can be used while the hook is attached. If the hook fails to attach or Akshan is moved or becomes immobilized, grounded, or polymorphed within the duration, the preparation will end prematurely, cancelling Heroic Swing in the process.
Second Cast: Akshan swings around the terrain in the target direction for 3 seconds, and stops upon colliding with an enemy champion or terrain. While swinging, he rapidly fires at the nearest visible enemy to deal them physical damage and apply on-hit effects at 25% effectiveness per shot.
Akshan will be knocked down by any immobilizing or polymorphing crowd control during the dash.
Third Cast: Akshan jumps to the target location, though not through terrain, and fires one last shot at a nearby visible enemy.
Scoring an enemy champion takedown reduces Heroic Swing's current cooldown to 0.5 seconds. The shots can critically strike forand apply Unknown value: stil / life steal at 100% effectiveness. Akshan prioritizes firing at enemy champions with stacks of Akshan's Dirty Fighting, will not fire while Akshan's Comeuppance is active, and reveals himself while firing. Heroic Swing can be cast during Akshan's other abilities.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage per Shot|{{ap|30 to 90}} {{as|(+ {{fd|17.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{times}} {{as|(1 + {{fd|0.3}} per 100% '''bonus''' attack speed)}}}}
E.notes:
* ''Heroic Swing'' grants a buff to '''Akshan''' for 2 seconds that indicates and determines the first cast's duration.
** This buff starts as soon as the ability is cast, and lingers for {{fd|0.125}} seconds after it expires.
*** This means the hook can be attached to terrain for longer if it hits it earlier in the duration, and vice versa.
** If '''Akshan''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} (excluding second cast's dash) or {{tip|blink|blinks}} or becomes affected by {{tip|immobilize|immobilization}}, {{tip|ground}}, or {{tip|polymorph}} in the duration, the buff is removed ''immediately'', causing the first cast to be lost and cancelling ''Heroic Swing'' entirely.
* '''Akshan''' immediately fires one shot at the beginning of his swing, one shot every {{fd|0.23}} seconds during the swing, and a final shot while dismounting from the swing for a total of 15 shots in a max duration swing of 3 seconds.
** The fire rate is not affected by [[attack speed]].
* '''Akshan''' can fire at any enemy unit excluding [[structure]]s and [[jungle plants]].
* Only ''Heroic Swing's'' first cast is disabled while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}. The third cast is still usable during those effects.
* ''Heroic Swing's'' second cast can be used while {{tip|silence|silenced}}.
* {{tip|Takedown|Takedowns}} against {{tip|clone|clones}} do not count for resetting ''Heroic Swing's'' cooldown.
* If a {{tip|takedown}} is scored while ''Heroic Swing'' is active, the cooldown afterwards will be {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
* '''Akshan''' automatically uses the third cast to end the second cast after 3 seconds of swinging.
* Each shot generates a stack of {{ri|Conqueror}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only block a single shot.
* The attack speed scaling on the damage of the attacks includes the bonus attack speed gained from '''Akshan's''' innate attack speed growth.
** At level 18, each shot at minimum deals {{fd|{{#expr: 90 * (1 + 0.3*17*{{ccd|Akshan|as_lvl}}*0.01)}}}} {{as|(+ {{fd|{{#expr:17.5 * (1 + 0.3*17*{{ccd|Akshan|as_lvl}}*0.01)}}}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} physical damage.
* {{pending for test}} Hook range including lollipop against walls, automated attacks range while swinging, final dash distance and speed.
* The following table refers for interactions while the hook is attached or in flight:
{{ct|attack=Automatically initiates the second cast.|move=Automatically initiates the second cast.|cast={{ai|Avengerang|Akshan}} and {{ai|Going Rogue|Akshan}} are disabled. {{ai|Comeuppance|Akshan}} is usable.|items=false|consume=false|spells=false,interrupts,false,false,false|interrupts=death,root,ground}}
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Akshan''' is swinging:
{{ct|attack=Automatically initiates the third cast.|move=Automatically initiates the third cast.|cast={{ai|Avengerang|Akshan}} and {{ai|Going Rogue|Akshan}} are disabled. {{ai|Comeuppance|Akshan}} is usable.|items=true,true,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts,true,interrupts,true|consume=true|spells=true,interrupts,false,false,true|interrupts=death,root}}

effects.str: • Physical Damage per Shot: (+ 17.5% bonus AD) × (1 + 0.3 per 100% bonus attack speed)

st_slices: (+ 17.5% bonus AD) × (1 + 0.3 per 100% bonus attack speed)

R.name: Comeuppance
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Akshan''' locks onto the target enemy champion and begins {{tip|channel|channeling}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, {{tip|true sight|revealing}} them as well as {{tip|sight|revealing}} himself. He gradually stores bullets into his weapon over the duration.
''Comeuppance'' can be recast after {{fd|0.5}} seconds, and does so automatically after the duration. ''Comeuppance'' is placed on a 5-second {{sti|cooldown}} if the channel is canceled.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Akshan''' fires all stored bullets at the target, each granting {{tip|sight}} around their trajectory as they travel and dealing {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy hit, including [[structures]], increased by {{as|{{pp|key=%|key1=%|type=target's '''missing''' health|0 to 300 for 11|0 to 100|formula=3% per 1% of target's '''missing''' health, capped at 100% '''missing''' health}}|health}}.

Each bullet's damage <!--is also increased by {{fd|0.5}}% per {{sti|{{as|1% critical strike chance}}}} and {{sti|{{as|critical damage}}}} bonuses at 50% effectiveness,-->{{tip|applies life steal|applies}} {{stil|life steal}} at 100% effectiveness, and {{tip|execute|executes}} {{tip|minions}}.
'''Akshan''' can move normally while channeling ''Comeuppance''.
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Akshan locks onto the target enemy champion and begins channeling for 2.5 seconds, revealing them as well as revealing himself. He gradually stores bullets into his weapon over the duration.
Comeuppance can be recast after 0.5 seconds, and does so automatically after the duration. Comeuppance is placed on a 5-second cooldown if the channel is canceled.
Recast: Akshan fires all stored bullets at the target, each granting sight around their trajectory as they travel and dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit, including structures, increased by 0 to 100 ‒ undefined.
Each bullet's damage applies Unknown value: stil / life steal at 100% effectiveness, and executes minions.
Akshan can move normally while channeling Comeuppance.
leveling:
{{#vardefine:critScaling|
{{times}} {{as|(1 + {{critical damage|0.5|0.5|flat=true}} per 100% critical strike chance)|critical chance}}}}{{st|Minimum Physical Damage per Bullet|{{ap|20 to 30}} {{as|(+ 10% AD)}}{{#var:critScaling}}|Maximum Physical Damage per Bullet|{{ap|20*4 to 30*4}} {{as|(+ {{ap|10*4}}% AD)}}{{#var:critScaling}}|Minimum Charged Physical Damage|{{ap|5*20|6*25|7*30}} {{as|(+ {{ap|50 to 70}}% AD)}}{{#var:critScaling}}|Damage to target with 67% missing hp|{{ap|3*5*20|3*6*25|3*7*30}} {{as|(+ {{ap|3*50 to 3*70}}% AD)}}{{#var:critScaling}}}}
R.notes:
* A kill threshold will appear on the [[health bar]] of the target locked onto during the channel, which increases each time '''Akshan''' stores a bullet. If the target's {{as|'''current''' health}} falls below the threshold, their health bar will be framed in red.
** The indicator factors the bonus damage applied by {{ai|Dirty Fighting|Akshan}} as well as [[damage modifier|damage modifiers]] and the target's resistances.
** It also factors the projected increase in the target's {{as|'''missing''' health}}, from which each consecutive bullet scales more.
** It updates dynamically over the channel's duration, reacting to fluctuations of the target's health and damage mitigations.
* The {{tip|true sight|reveal}} will linger for 2 seconds after the channel has ended.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not prevent the lock-on and will only block a single bullet.
* ''Comeuppance'' will not go on a reduced cooldown if '''Akshan''' {{tip|death|dies}} during the channel.
* ''Comeuppance'' will cancel if the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}} or {{tip|death|dies}} during the channel.
* Damage to structures '''does''' scale with their {{as|'''missing''' health}}.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Akshan''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|move=true|cast={{ai|Q|Akshan}} and {{ai|W|Akshan}} are disabled. {{ai|E|Akshan}} is usable.|attack=false|items=false|consume=false|spells=true,true,false,false,interrupts|interrupts=death,silence}}
